NextzenApi.app_description:
Music Finder is the best way to identify the music around you. It´s very simple and easy to use.

Music Finder lets you play a music preview of the identified track and give you the option to listen to the full song on Deezer, Spotify, Apple Music, Youtube, VK, and Yandex Music streaming services.

Features:
• Find a song within seconds (Powered by ACRCloud).
• Every identified song is saved on the history page.
• Watch music videos on YouTube.
• Listen to the full song you recognized in Deezer, Spotify, Apple Music, Youtube and VK.
• Hypnotic visualizer.
• Tou can Find  the song Lyrics.
